forum.content:
In this month. I did fasting the second time

But with a different atmosphere
Well, far from family
No frenetic sound of small children playing firecrackers or sound wave Koran.
A challenge for me.
 When everyone asleep
In the middle of the night, I woke up with my eyes half open
Toward the kitchen to prepare
  pre-dawn meal. Nothing special. only drink cereal and bread that always accompany the meal
  Sahur me. If at home I just sit in front of TV. While waiting for my mother's cooking which is presented

An atmosphere like that that I miss now.
While imagining their laughter. if I wake up for sahur hard on my mother scolded. Oh God I missed all of it

Moreover, the hot weather here
  As if dry up all the throat

Not easy to run fast in the middle of the non-Muslim society

But all that will be the most rewarding experiences
  May be I miss one day.

I believe. All the things we do every day. is a memory and lessons to improve ourselves to be better from day to day

So what are you complaining about now. Not necessarily a bad thing for you
It could be that all of that is starting to make yourself better
forum.title: Fasting Overseas
